name: Alchemist

patterns.pattern: ^A diminutive homunculus resembling (\w+) stares menacingly at you, its eyes flashing brightly\.$
^(\w+) glowers at you with a look of repressed disgust before making a slight gesture toward you\.$
^A short convulsion sweeps through your body as (\w+) wracks your \w+ humour\.$
^A short convulsion sweeps through your body as (\w+) wracks your \w+ and \w+ humours\.$
^A low growl echoes from a diminutive homunculus resembling (\w+)'s throat, and blood begins flowing from your nose\.$

^A diminutive homunculus resembling (\w+) turns its head towards you, its jaws opening wider than what seems possible\. The homunculus stares intently at you and lets out an ear-piercing shriek that disrupts your thoughts\.$
^(\w+) waves a hand in your direction and you feel energy wreathing about you\. A strong burning sensation rushes through your body\.$
^(\w+) waves a hand in your direction and you feel energy wreathing about you\. Small patches of your skin waver before turning into shards of sharp glass\.$

script: if agnosticdb and agnosticdb.class_tracking then agnosticdb.class_tracking.set_class(matches[2], 'Alchemist') end

patterns.pattern: ^Your .+ (?:are|is) wracked by residual energy\.$

name: Apostate

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) stares at you, giving you the evil eye\.$
^Your .+ defence has been stripped by (\w+)'s Baalzadeen\.$
^(\w+)'s Baalzadeen casts a piercing glance at you\.$
^With a snarl, (\w+)'s Baalzadeen opens its mouth and spews a foul black liquid all over you\.$
^Before you can avoid it, (\w+)'s hand brushes against your arm and it withers away\.$
^You watch in horror as (\w+) touches your \w+ arm, and it shrivels away to uselessness\.$
^(\w+) reaches out and grabs your leg, which almost gives way underneath you as it shrivels feebly away\.$
^You stumble slightly as (\w+) touches your \w+ leg, and it shrivels away\.$

script: if agnosticdb and agnosticdb.class_tracking then agnosticdb.class_tracking.set_class(matches[2], 'Apostate') end

name: Magi

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) weaves earth and water and a torrent of thick sticky mud thunders forth to roll over you and knocking you off your feet.$
^(\w+) clicks \w+ fingers and a bolt of lightning strikes from the air in a fulminous flash to transfix you.$
^(\w+) makes no motion or word, but a roiling nausea rolls through you, a terrible dizziness and rejection as bile fills the back of your throat.$
^(\w+) makes the slightest flick with an elemental staff, and a deluge of freezing water descends like the hand of some angered titan to smash you with a hammer colder than the oldest grave.$
^A wave of heat rolls over you from the direction of (\w+), and flames ignite upon your skin.$

name: Monk Shik

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) whips (.+) in a long sweep at your legs\.$
^Stepping forward, (\w+) drives (.+) into your (.+)\.

^(\w+) lashes out with a high kick at your (\w+)\.$
^Bracing \w+ back foot, (\w+) lunges forward with a knotted willow staff at your (.+)\.$
^Continuing \w+ kata, (\w+) spins a knotted willow staff in (\w+) hands before driving it in a swiftthrust towards your (.+)\.$
^Snapping back into a ready stance, (\w+) whips a knotted willow staff in a wide arc at your (.+)\.$
^Spinning on one foot (\w+) drives a knotted willow staff into your (.+) with a lightning-fast thrust\.$
^Snapping \w+ leg out to its full extent, (\w+) drives a heel into your (.+)\.$
^(\w+) lashes out with a straight kick at you\.$

name: Occultist

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) draws back with a knowing smirk and utters some alien word that vibrates deep within your bones\. Your mind swirls and body convulses in excruciating pain as your very spirit cries out in agony\.$
^(\w+) passes (\w+) hand in front of you\. You feel an invisible claw brush the back of your skull\.$
^(\w+) lowers (\w+) eyes and an unearthly image appears before you\. Unable to accept what this vision means, your thoughts become jumbled\.$
^(\w+) speaks something in an unknown and impossible language\. Unable to process the alien images these words induce, your thoughts become jumbled\.$
^(\w+) utters a terrible curse and points a finger at you\.$
^(\w+) gestures sharply in your direction, and a mass of green slime flows up and over you, coating your skin\.$
^Seven rays of different coloured light spring out from (\w+)'s outstretched hands, irradiating the location with blinding strobes\.$
^(\w+) sends an icy blue tendril of light that lashes out at you and wraps around you, sending a strange chill deep into your bones\.$
^(\w+) makes a sharp motion with one hand in your direction, the briefest flicker of something crackling between (\w+) digits\.$
^Before you can avoid it, (\w+) hand brushes against your (\w+) and it withers away\.$
^(\w+) makes a sudden, quick gesture in front of you, almost hitting your nose\. (\w+) hand glows with a vibrant violet light before snapping back to (\w+) side\.$

script: if agnosticdb and agnosticdb.class_tracking then agnosticdb.class_tracking.set_class(matches[2], 'Occultist') end

name: Paladin

patterns.pattern: ^As fire surges about the righteous (\w+), a terrible heat fills your chest, a scorching pain that threatens to scour you from Creation\.$
^(\w+) is outlined in a nimbus of fire for an instant as (\w+) glares at you, but it abruptly winks out\.$
^A nimbus of flame blazes about (\w+) as (\w+) turns (\w+) righteousness upon you.$
^.+ flares with brilliant flame as (\w+) lunges for you!$
^Fire burns in the eyes of (\w+) as (\w+) turns (\w+) righteous attention towardsyou.$
^(\w+) whispers a prayer to the Righteous Fire, and white flame bursts into Creation to scour your blight away\.$
^At the command of (\w+) a beam of radiance strikes down from on high, transfixing you with its relentless glare.$

script: if agnosticdb and agnosticdb.class_tracking then agnosticdb.class_tracking.set_class(matches[2], 'Paladin') end

name: Pariah

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) sweeps (.+) in a circle above (\w+) head, the point of the blade coming to rest aimed at you. You feel a sharp pain, gone as swiftly as it came, and a fine crimson spray falls about you and (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) raises (\w+) left hand in front of you, clenching it into a fist, your body spasming under some arcane assault\.$
^(\w+)'s hand lashes out, (\w+) glittering ritual blade flashing as drops of crimson blood land upon its ensorceled blade\.$
^(\w+) traces a logograph (.+) in the air before you, the blood upon his knife bursting into arcane flame as it hangs in the wake of the blade's passage\.$

^With a brutal thrust of a translucent sword, (\w+) sinks (\w+) weapon into your guts, ripping it freein a spray of crimson\.$

^(\w+) gives a great shout of exertion as (\w+) eyes lock with yours, and a terrible pain explodeswithin your skull, your vision blacking out and your skull feeling like it shall burst apart at anymoment\.$

^(\w+) ducks low, (\w+) blade slicing into your (.+)\.$

name: Sylvan

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) gestures sharply in your direction with one hand, and invisible whips viciously lash at you\.$

^More a physical blow than a simple sound, the shocking thunderclap summoned forth by (\w+) leaves you reeling\.$
^Sweat breaking out on the forehead of (\w+) is your only warning before a bolt of lightning leaps down from on high, slamming into you and electrifying every nerve in a synchronised wave of agony\.$
